summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5737 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, R. B. Wark First Addition (Unrecorded), being the alley established by Ordinance No. 64684 between Fauntleroy Avenue and 46th Avenue Southwest, from West Trenton Street to West Cloverdale Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75758, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
